info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61495
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 61495
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 6, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	10 alt3.aspmx.l.google.com.
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	10 alt4.aspmx.l.google.com.
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	5 alt1.aspmx.l.google.com.
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	32767 ms17411114.msv1.invalid.
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	5 alt2.aspmx.l.google.com.
blog.zenika.com.	14400	IN	MX	1 aspmx.l.google.com.

request:
GET /xmlrpc.php HTTP/1.1
Host: blog.zenika.com
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
Connection: close
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Allow: POST
Content-Type: text/plain;charset=utf-8
Date: Sun, 15 May 2022 03:26:55 GMT
Host-Header: WordPress.com
Server: nginx
Set-Cookie: wordpress_google_apps_login=9b6166266be526bd96db7bb09e2b98eb; path=/; secure; HttpOnly
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000
X-Ac: 3.dca _atomic_dca
X-Hacker: If you're reading this, you should visit automattic.com/jobs and apply to join the fun, mention this header.

XML-RPC server accepts POST requests only.

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: blog.zenika.com
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: blog.zenika.com' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://blog.zenika.com/'

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35964
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35964
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 7, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"MS=ms17411114"
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=dLFAXwanRugkOUVVPb3vj0PgeMBLbkyROdlBEl5hqtE"
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"GRGjGQmL941NMBQHn2aGYbt++Lc="
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"ca3-0609878768304deb921457eb9e3082ff"
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=nlWxvbsHrenE3zdJb1XTiLs0JYyAE-RVwVFeY41o5fE"
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=_fl5xuiFSt-WDZ5HGztDRY_vUiAegnY1vBrHI7ZEZzM"
blog.zenika.com.	3600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.google.com ~all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24784
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 24784
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;blog.zenika.com.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
blog.zenika.com.	86400	IN	NS	ns1.wordpress.com.
blog.zenika.com.	86400	IN	NS	ns2.wordpress.com.
blog.zenika.com.	86400	IN	NS	ns3.wordpress.com.

info.name: Email Service Detector
